sources.title: The Four Musicians of Bremen (1922)
sources.description: Four animal musicians consisting of a Horse, Cat, Dog, & Rooster set out on their own quest to try to find some fame by playing their own music. Unfortunately every where they go, trouble always occurs whether they are being chased by town folk, a sword fish, or being attacked by an army. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-four-musicians-of-bremen-1922/

metadata.Plot: Four animal musicians consisting of a Horse, Cat, Dog, & Rooster set out on their own quest to try to find some fame by playing their own music. Unfortunitly every where they go, trouble always occurs whether they are being chased by town folk, a sword fish, or being attacked by an army.
metadata.Writer: Jacob Grimm, Wilhelm Grimm, Walt Pfeiffer
